entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo Gov. Cuomo you placed Covid-19 individuals into nursing homes. You failed to ensure that staff had PPE. Temperature taking twice a week months later is an absolute joke. All staff must have temperature taken & documented before going into nursing homes at every shift every day.
